author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ascendis Health appoints Thomas Thomsen as CEO with effect from 1 March 2018
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Ascendis Health Ltd:
* ANNOUNCE APPOINTMENT OF THOMAS THOMSEN AS CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND AS AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WITH EFFECT FROM 1 MARCH 2018
* THOMAS WILL SUCCEED KARSTEN WELLNER WHO HAS BEEN THE CEO SINCE THE FOUNDING OF THE GROUP IN 2011
* ‍KARSTEN WILL STAND DOWN AS CEO ON 1 MARCH 2018 AND AS A BOARD DIRECTOR ON 30 JUNE 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
